p.k: The night of the red moon
p.d: Jeanne Dewaere has destroyed the evidence that could incriminate her young protégé, Manon, in a case of vandalism gone wrong. As a former inmate, she wants to save the young woman from the same fate. But when a hated neighbour is found dead, her secrets make her the main suspect. Directed by: Josée Dayan (season 1, France, 2017) Screenplay: Sylvie Granotier Cast: Corinne Masiero (Inspector Marleau), Sandrine Bonnaire (Jeanne Dewaere), Manuel Blanc (Alain Peras), Alain Fromager (Michel Chalard), Aymeric Demarigny (Briere), Marius Colucci (Oscar Langevin), Vincent Primault (Gabriel), Céline Samie (Émilie Guingand), Louison Bergman (Manon Bechet), Jean-Claude Drouot (Léopold Salaun) Genre: detective Awards: best series of the year - Téléstar/Télé Poche award, La Rochelle Festival of TV Fiction 2017, best series in recent years - Téléstar/Télé Poche award, La Rochelle Festival of TV Fiction 2018, best actress in the Lauriers de la radio et de la télévision 2017
